snippet: David Karp, Tumblr's founder, shares his inspiration and mistakes on the inaugural episode of The Times's weekly technology show. Also, Sam Grobart talks with Yusuf Mehdi, the chief marketing officer for Microsoft's Interactive Entertainment...
abstract: David Karp, Tumblr's founder, shares his inspiration and mistakes on the inaugural episode of The Times's weekly technology show. Also, Sam Grobart talks with Yusuf Mehdi, the chief marketing officer for Microsoft's Interactive Entertainment Business; Napster's founders introduce their latest venture; and Jenna Wortham checks out TaskRabbit, Pocketbooth and Uber.

headline.main: TimesCast Tech: Speaking With Tumblr's Founder
